alert.note: Alert for Northern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 04 at 11:55AM MDT until April 06 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 4 inches at lower elevations, 4 to 8 inches over Marias Pass, and higher amounts in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 90 mph. * WHERE...Northern Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...Until 1 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
